#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int x,y,z,u,v,i;
        cin>>x>>y>>u>>v;
        if(u>v)
        {
            i=floor((y-x)/(u-v));
            z=u*i;
            cout<<"("<<z+x<<","<<"0)"<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"not possible"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
